description: The 52-year-old man, wanted in Germany, was detained in north-eastern France.
title: Italian held in France on suspicion of 160 rapes and sexual assaults
title_page: Italian held in France on suspicion of 160 rapes and sexual assaults - BBC News
maintext: French reports said that among the offences he was suspected of committing were the rape of his daughter over a number of years.
